name: Extreme School Driving Simulator
description: This game has the role to simulate real situations and have as aims to prepare future drivers not only in a virtual world but also for the real world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GT 730 Storage: 200 MB available space
